goal.name: m00_one_launch_area
goal.title: ALL Equipment Fits in ONE Launch area under 12"

goal.name: m01_count_soil_deposits
goal.title: #Soil Deposits Cleared Touching Mat - not touching equipment at end

goal.name: m01_archaeologist_brush_not_touching_dig_sit
goal.title: Archaeologist Brush Not Touching Dig Site - not touching equipment at end

goal.name: m03_team_cart_on_opposing_field
goal.title: Your Team's Minecart on the Opposing Team's Field

goal.name: m03_opposing_cart_on_your_field
goal.title: AND Opposing Minecart on Your Field

goal.name: m04_artifact_not_touching_mine
goal.title: Precious Artifact NOT Touching Mine - not touching equipment at end

goal.name: m04_both_support_structures_standing
goal.title: Both Support Structures Standing - not touching equipment at end

goal.title: Structure Floor is Completely Upright - not touching equipment at end

goal.name: m07_millstone_not_touching
goal.title: Millstone No Longer Touching its Base

goal.title: Roof is Completely Raised - not touching equipment at end

goal.name: m09_market_wares_raised
goal.title: Market Wares are Raised - not touching equipment at end

goal.name: m11_artifacts_raised
goal.title: Artifacts Raised - not touching equipment at end

goal.name: m11_flag_partly_lowered
goal.title: AND Crane Flag at Least Party Lowered - not touching equipment at end

goal.name: m12_sand_cleared
goal.title: Sand Completely Cleared - not touching equipment at end

goal.name: m12_ship_raised
goal.title: Ship Completely Raised - not touching equipment at end

goal.name: m13_statue_raised
goal.title: Statue Completely Raised - not touching equipment at end

goal.name: m14_brush
goal.title: Brush - Touching Mat and Partly in Forum - not touching equipment at end

goal.name: m14_count_topsoil

goal.title: Precious Artifact - Touching Mat and Partly in Forum - not touching equipment at end

goal.title: Opposing Team Minecart - Touching Mat and Partly in Forum - not touching equipment at end

goal.name: m14_ore_with_fossilized_artifact
goal.title: Ore WITH Fossilized Artifact - Touching Mat and Partly in Forum - not touching equipment at end

goal.title: Millstone - Touching Mat and Partly in Forum - not touching equipment at end

goal.name: m15_count_flags

goalGroup.title: GRACIOUS PROFESSIONALISM DISPLAYED AT THE ROBOT GAME TABLE

goal.name: gp_score
goal.title: GP - Does not affect Robot Game Score

restriction.message: Brush not removed from Dig Site
At Least ONE Ore Block must be Removed
Millstone not removed from its Base
Scale Pan Not Removed from Scale
Crane Flag Cannot be partly lowered if Artifact Not Raised

subjectiveCategory.name: project
subjectiveCategory.title: Innovation Project
subjectiveCategory.scoreSheetInstructions: Teams should communicate to the judges their achievement in each of the following criteria. This rubric should be filled out according to the Innovation Project presentation. Judges are required to tick one box on each separate row to indicate the level the team has achieved. If the team exceeds, a short comment in the exceeds column is required.

goalGroup.title: IDENTIFY
goalGroup.description: - Team had a clearly defined problem that was well researched.

goal.name: identify_1
goal.title: Identify1
goal.description: Team had a clearly defined problem.

range.shortDescription: Unclear definition of the problem
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partially clear definition of the problem
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear definition of the problem
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: How has the team exceeded?
range.title: Exceeds

goal.name: identify_2
goal.title: Identify2 - (CV - DISCOVERY)
goal.description: Team problem was well researched.

range.shortDescription: Minimal evidence of research
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partial evidence of research from one or more sources
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear, detailed research from a variety of sources
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: How has the team exceeded?
range.title: Exceeds

goalGroup.title: DESIGN
goalGroup.description: - Team worked together while creating a project plan and developing their ideas.

goal.name: design_1
goal.title: Design1
goal.description: Team showed evidence of planning which idea to develop.

range.shortDescription: Minimal evidence of an effective project plan
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partial evidence of an effective project plan
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear evidence of an effective project plan
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: How has the team exceeded?
range.title: Exceeds

goal.name: design_2
goal.title: Design2 - (CV - TEAMWORK)
goal.description: Team generated innovative ideas independently before selecting which one to develop.

range.shortDescription: Minimal evidence that development process involved all team members
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partial evidence that development process involved all team members
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear evidence that development process involved all team members
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: How has the team exceeded?
range.title: Exceeds

goalGroup.title: CREATE
goalGroup.description: - Team developed an original idea or built on an existing one with a prototype model/drawing to represent their solution.

goal.name: create_1
goal.title: Create1 - (CV - INNOVATION)
goal.description: Team developed an original idea or built on an existing one .

range.shortDescription: Minimal explanation of innovation in solution
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Simple explanation of innovation in solution
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Detailed explanation of innovation in solution
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: How has the team exceeded?
range.title: Exceeds

goal.name: create_2
goal.title: Create2
goal.description: Team developed a prototype model/drawing to represent their solution.

range.shortDescription: Unclear model/drawing that represents the solution
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Simple model/drawing that represents the solution
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Detailed model/drawing that represents the solution
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: How has the team exceeded?
range.title: Exceeds

goalGroup.title: ITERATE
goalGroup.description: - Team shared their ideas with others, collected feedback, and included improvements to their solution.

goal.name: goal_0
goal.title: Iterate1
goal.description: Team shared their solution/ideas.

range.shortDescription: Minimal sharing of their solution with others
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Solution shared with at least one person/group
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Solution shared with multiple people/groups
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: How has the team exceeded?
range.title: Exceeds

goal.name: iterate_2
goal.title: Iterate2
goal.description: Team shared improvements in their solution.

range.shortDescription: Minimal evidence of improvements based on feedback
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partial evidence of improvements based on feedback
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear evidence of improvements based on feedback
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: How has the team exceeded?
range.title: Exceeds

goalGroup.title: COMMUNICATE
goalGroup.description: - Team shared an effective presentation of their solution, its impact on others, and celebrated their team's progress.

goal.name: communicate_1
goal.title: Communicate1 - (CV - IMPACT)
goal.description: Team was able to explain the potential impact of the solution on others

range.shortDescription: Unclear explanation of the solution and its potential impact on others
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partially clear explanation of solution and its potential impact on others
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear explanation of solution and its potential impact on others
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: How has the team exceeded?
range.title: Exceeds

goal.name: communicate_2
goal.title: Communicate2 - (CV - FUN)
goal.description: Team showed pride and enthusiasm for their work

range.shortDescription: Presentation shows minimal pride or enthusiasm for their work
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Presentation shows partial pride or enthusiasm for their work
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Presentation clearly shows pride or enthusiasm for their work
range.title: Accomplished

range.shortDescription: How has the team exceeded?
range.title: Exceeds

subjectiveCategory.name: robot_design
subjectiveCategory.title: Robot Design
subjectiveCategory.scoreSheetInstructions: Teams should communicate to the judges their achievement in each of the following criteria. This rubric should be filled out according to the Robot Design explanation. Judges are required to tick one box on each separate row to indicate the level the team has achieved. If the team exceeds, a short comment in the exceeds column is required.

goalGroup.title: IDENTIFY
goalGroup.description: - Team determined which missions to attempt, explored building and coding resources, and sought guidance as needed.

goal.name: identify_one
goal.title: Identify1
goal.description: Team had a clear mission strategy for the robot and attachment. Team had a clear mission strategy for the programs written.

range.shortDescription: Minimal evidence of mission strategy
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partial evidence of mission strategy
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear evidence of mission strategy
range.title: Accomplished

goal.name: identify_two
goal.title: Identify2 - (CV - DISCOVERY)
goal.description: Team members learned about robot building. Team members learned about coding

range.shortDescription: Minimal use of building or coding resources
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Some use of building or coding resources
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear use of building or coding resources to support their mission strategy
range.title: Accomplished

goalGroup.title: DESIGN
goalGroup.description: - Team members worked collaboratively on their designs and developed the building and coding skills needed.

goal.name: design_1
goal.title: Design1 - (CV - INCLUSION)
goal.description: All team members contributed ideas to building and coding

range.shortDescription: Minimal evidence that all team members contributed ideas
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partial evidence that all team members contributed ideas
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear evidence that all team members contributed ideas
range.title: Accomplished

goal.name: design_2
goal.title: Design2
goal.description: Team explained the building and coding skills of all team members

range.shortDescription: Minimal evidence of building and coding skills in all team members
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partial evidence of building and coding skills in all team members
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear evidence of building and coding skills in all team members
range.title: Accomplished

goalGroup.title: CREATE
goalGroup.description: - Team developed original designs or improved on existing ones according to their mission strategy.

goal.name: create_1
goal.title: Create1
goal.description: Team explained their robot, attachments and their purposes.

range.shortDescription: Unclear explanation of attachments and their purpose
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Simple explanation of attachments and their purpose
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear explanation of innovative attachments and their purpose
range.title: Accomplished

goal.name: create_2
goal.title: Create2
goal.description: Team explained how their robot will complete the missions. Team explained how their code and sensors make their robot work

range.shortDescription: Unclear explanation of code and/or sensor use
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Simple explanation of code and/or sensor use
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear explanation of innovative code and/or sensor use
range.title: Accomplished

goalGroup.title: ITERATE
goalGroup.description: - Team repeatedly tested their robot and code to identify areas for improvement and incorporated the findings into their current solutions.

goal.name: iterate_1
goal.title: Iterate1
goal.description: Team explained how they tested their robot. Team explained how they tested their code

range.shortDescription: Minimal evidence of testing their robot and code
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partial evidence of testing their robot and code
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear evidence of repeated testing of their robot and code
range.title: Accomplished

goal.name: iterate_2
goal.title: Iterate2 - (CV - INNOVATION)
goal.description: Team made improvements to their robot and code based on testing.

range.shortDescription: Minimal evidence of improvements based on testing
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Partial evidence of improvements based on testing
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Clear evidence of improvements based on testing
range.title: Accomplished

goalGroup.title: COMMUNICATE
goalGroup.description: -Team effectively explained what they learned from the robot design and celebrated their progress.

goal.name: communicate_1
goal.title: Communicate1 - (CV - IMPACT)
goal.description: Team explained their robot design process and lessons learned

range.shortDescription: Unclear explanation of process and lessons learned
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Simple explanation of process and lessons learned
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Detailed explanation of process and lessons learned
range.title: Accomplished

goal.name: communicate_2
goal.title: Communicate2 - (CV - FUN)
goal.description: Team shows pride and enthusiasm for their robot design work

range.shortDescription: Team shows minimal pride or enthusiasm for their work
range.title: Beginning

range.shortDescription: Team shows partial pride or enthusiasm for their work
range.title: Developing

range.shortDescription: Team clearly shows pride or enthusiasm for their work
range.title: Accomplished

nonNumericCategory.title: Engineering Excellence
nonNumericCategory.description: This award celebrates a team with an efficiently designed robot, an innovative project solution that effectively addresses the season challenge, and Core Values evident in all they do.

nonNumericCategory.title: MN Programming Award
nonNumericCategory.description: The Minnesota Programming Award is presented to the team best demonstrating an in-depth understanding of sound programming principles, as observed during the Robot Design judging.

nonNumericCategory.title: Breakthrough Award
nonNumericCategory.description: A team that made significant progress in their confidence and capability and who understand that what they discover is more important than what they win.

nonNumericCategory.title: Rising All-Star
nonNumericCategory.description: A team that the judges notice and expect great things from in the future.

nonNumericCategory.title: Motivate
nonNumericCategory.description: A team that embraces the culture of FIRST LEGO League through team building, team spirit, and displayed enthusiasm.

nonNumericCategory.title: Creative Presentation
nonNumericCategory.description: The Presentation Award is presented to the team with the most imaginative and creative presentation demonstrating the teams' research and solution to the Research Challenge Assignment.

nonNumericCategory.title: Judges Award
nonNumericCategory.description: This award is given at the Judges discretion to a team that deserves recognition but does not fit it another category.
